titles: Fearfull prodigies in Italy, seene neere the citie of Rome, in the aire, between the Castle Angelo and the Vatican as it was sent in a letter by a merchant of good credit living in Ligorne to Seignior Torriano, an Italian here resident in London, and by him faithfully translated into English.
author: Di Sofi, Antonio.
notes: Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
keywords: Hallucinations and illusions --  Early works to 1800.
